name: rule_standard_schema.json
description: Defines the required structure for all rule standards in TrueSignal. All rule standards must conform to this schema and implicitly extend rule.json.

description.description: A plain language description of the rule standard's purpose.

required.description: Array of required field names for the rule.

properties.description: Field definitions for rules conforming to this standard.

examples.description: Array of example rule objects that conform to this standard.

additionalProperties.description: Whether additional fields are allowed beyond those defined in 'properties'.
